scripts.run4: ((npx wdio --spec test/specs/levelup.e2e.js > /dev/null || npx wdio --spec test/specs/levelup.e2e.js > /dev/null || npx wdio --spec test/specs/levelup.e2e.js > /dev/null || npx wdio --spec test/specs/levelup.e2e.js > /dev/null) && play ~/Downloads/happy.mp3 -q repeat 1) || play ~/Downloads/sad.mp3 -q repeat 1
scripts.level: (npx wdio --spec test/specs/levelup.e2e.js > /dev/null && play ~/Downloads/happy.mp3 -q repeat 1) || play ~/Downloads/sad.mp3 -q repeat 1
scripts.arena: (npx wdio --spec test/specs/arena.e2e.js > /dev/null && play ~/Downloads/happy.mp3 -q repeat 1) || play ~/Downloads/sad.mp3 -q repeat 1
